Verses: 1 pinnum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
2 manupuththirane, Isravel Dhesaththaikkuriththuk Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Mudivu Varugiradhu, Dhesaththin Naalu Munaigalin Melum Mudivu Varugiradhu.
3 ippodhe Unmel Mudivu Varugiradhu; Naan En Kobaththai Unmel Varuviththu, Un Vazhigalukkuththakkadhaaga Unnai Nyaayantheerththu, Un Ellaa Aruvaruppugalin Palanaiyum Unmel Varappannuven.

4 en Kan Unnaith Thappavidaadhu; Naan Irangaamal Un Vazhigalukkuththakkadhai Unmel Varappannuven; Un Aruvaruppugalukkuththakkadhu Un Naduvil Vandhirukkum; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal.
5 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Theengu Varugiradhu; Idho, Egamaana Theengu Varugiradhu.
6 mudivu Varugiradhu, Mudivu Varugiradhu, Adhu Unmel Nokkamaayirukkiradhu; Idho, Varugiradhu.
7 dhesaththil Kudiyirukkiravane, Annaalin Vidiyarkaalam Varugiradhu, Kaalam Varugiradhu, Amaliyin Naal Sameebiththirukkiradhu, Malaigalil Sandhoshasaththam Illai.

8 ippozhudhu Viraivil En Ukkiraththai Unmel Ootri, En Kobaththai Unnil Theerththukkondu, Unnai Un Vazhigalukkuththakkadhaaga Nyaayantheerththu, Un Ellaa Aruvaruppugalin Palanaiyum Unmel Varappannuven.

9 en Kan Unnaith Thappavidaadhu; Naan Irangaamal Un Vazhigalukkuththakkadhai Unmel Varappannuven; Un Aruvaruppugalukkuththakkadhu Un Naduvil Vandhirukkum; Appozhudhu Adikkiravaraagiya Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal.
10 idho, Andha Naal, Idho, Varugiradhu, Annaalin Vidiyarkaalam Udhikkiradhu, Milaaru Pookkiradhu, Agandhai Sezhikkiradhu.

11 akkiramaththukku Milaaraagak Kodumai Ezhumbugiradhu; Avargalilum Avargaludaiya Thiralaana Kumbilum Avargaludaiya Amaliyilum Ondrum Meedhiyaayiruppadhillai; Avargalnimiththam Pulambal Undaayiruppadhumillai.
12 andhak Kaalam Varugiradhu, Andha Naal Kittugiradhu; Kollugiravan Sandhoshappadaamalum, Virkiravan Dhukkappadaamalum Iruppaanaaga; Adhin Thiralaana Kumbalmelum Ukkiram Irangum.

13 avargal Jeevanullorukkulle Innum Uyirodirundhaalum, Vitravan Virkappattadharkuth Thirumbivaruvadhillai; Adhin Thiralaana Kumbinmelum Undaana Dharisanam Thirumbaadhu; Than Akkiramaththile Vaazhugira Evanum Thannaiththidappaduththamaattaan.
14 avargal Ekkaalam Oodhi, Ellaavatraiyum Aayaththampanniyum, Yuththaththukkup Pogiravanillai; En Ukkiram Adhin Thiralaana Kumbinmelum Irangugiradhu.
15 veliye Pattayamum Ulle Kollainoyum Panjamum Undu; Vayal Veliyil Irukkiravan Pattayaththaal Saavaan; Nagaraththil Irukkiravanaiyo Panjamum Kollainoyum Patchikkum.

16 avargalil Thappugiravargal Thappuvaargal; Aanaalum Avargal Anaivarum Avanavan Than Than Akkiramaththinimiththam Dhukkiththuk Kooppidugira Pallaththaakkugalin Puraakkalaippola Malaigalil Iruppaargal.
17 ellaak Kaigalum Saliththu, Ellaa Muzhankaalgalum Thanneeraippol Thaththalikkum.
18 rattai Uduththikkolvaargal; Thaththalippu Avargalai Moodum; Ellaa Mugangalum Vetkappadum, Ellaath Thalaigalum Mottaiyidappadum.

19 thangal Velliyaith Therukkalil Erindhuviduvaargal; Avargaludaiya Pon Vendaaveruppaayirukkum; Karththarudaiya Sinaththin Naalile Avargal Velliyum Avargal Ponnum Avargalai Viduvikkamaattaadhu; Avargal Adhinaal Thangal Aaththumaakkalaith Thirupthiyaakkuvadhum Illai Thangal Vayirugalai Nirappuvadhum Illai; Avargal Akkiramame Avargalukku Idaralaayirundhadhu.

20 avarudaiya Singaaraththin Magimaiyai Agandhaikkendru Vaiththu, Adhile Aruvarukkappadaththakkadhum Seeyendrigazhappadaththakkadhumaana Kaariyangalin Vikkiragangalai Undupanninaargal; Aagaiyaal Naan Avaigalai Avargalukku Vendaaveruppaakki,
21 adhai Anniyar Kaiyile Kollaiyaagavum, Boomiyil Dhushtargalukku Sooraiyaagavum Koduppen; Avargal Adhaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkuvaargal.
22 en Mugaththai Avargalai Vittuth Thiruppuven; Adhinaal En Andharanga Sthalaththaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkuvaargal; Parigaarar Adharkul Pravesiththu, Adhaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkuvaargal.
23 oru Sangiliyaip Pannivai; Dhesam Nyaayaththeerppukkullaana Raththappazhigalaal Niraindhirukkiradhu; Nagaram Kodumaiyaal Niraindhirukkiradhu.

24 aagaiyaal Purajaadhigalin Dhushtargalai Varappannuven, Avargal Ivargaludaiya Veedugalai Sudhandhariththukkolvaargal; Balavaangalin Perumaiyai Ozhiyappannuven, Avargal Parisuththa Sthalangal Parisuththakkulaichchalaagum.
25 sangaaram Varugiradhu; Appozhudhu Samaadhaanaththaith Theduvaargal; Aanaalum Adhu Kidaiyaadhu.

26 vikkinaththinmel Vikkinam Varum; Dhurchcheydhiyinmel Dhurchcheydhi Pirakkum; Appozhudhu Theerkkadharisiyinidaththile Dharisanaththaith Theduvaargal; Aanaalum Aasaariyinidaththile Vedhamum Moopparidaththile Aalosanaiyum Iraamal Ozhindhupogum.

27 raajaa Dhukkiththukkondiruppaan; Prabuvaith Thigil Moodikkondirukkum; Dhesaththu Janangalin Kaigal Thalarndhupogum; Naan Avargal Vazhigalinpadiye Avargalukku Seydhu, Avargal Nyaayangalinpadiye Avargalai Nyaayantheerppen; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal Endraar.
